title: Is the PS5 Going to Outsell PS4? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.24.21
description:
Go to http://brooklinen.com and use promo code KFGD to get $25 off when you spend $100 or more, plus free shipping!

Go to http://burrow.com/games to get $75 off your first order!

For a limited time, visit http://logitechg.com and use code KindaFunnyDailyFreeShip222 for free express shipping, but hurry — this promo code expires in 5 days!

What's Good Games' Andrea Rene joins Tim to talk about PlayStation's State of Play, Cyberpunk's delay, and more! 

Follow Andrea: http://www.twitter.com/andrearene

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:30 - Housekeeping
Kinda Funny Contracts are now live in Hitman 3! Go play and see if you can kill the people in-game that Greg wants you to!
Blessing is playing Among Us on IGN’s Black History month stream today at 2 pm PT!
Our 3rd FCF draft is tonight! 5:30 p.m. PT join Greg, Snowbikemike, and many more as we have a beer and draft the team that will face off against Johnny Football and the Zappers this Saturday!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: GrahamOfLegend, David Meintel, Trent Berrie, Black Jack, Luiz Aguiar (@8bitLuiz), James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), &The Nano Biologist
The Roper Report   -
00:05:50 - PlayStation State of Play Tomorrow! Sid Shuman @ the PlayStation Blog
00:18:15 - Have we considered that this strategy is Sony's "response" to gamepass vs. making their own gamepass alternative (Ps Now + day and date first party launches)? - Best Friends Q:dhruvenator (pronounced drewvenator)
00:23:28 - Cyberpunk 2077 Patch Delayed Because of Hack, via Cyberpunk’s Twitter
00:27:15 - Do you see CDPR delaying further big fixes for Cyberpunk due to "unforeseen events" "beyond their control"? - Best Friends Q:Bilbo Baginzezz
00:29:40 - Valheim hits 4 million copies in 3 weeks, Eddie @ GameSpot
00:33:02 - Notre Dame Won’t be in EA College Football, Brendan Sinclair @ GamesIndustry.biz
00:36:28 -  Alien coming to Fortnite
00:39:45 - Sar Wars Republic Commando Release Date, via Press Release
00:44:00 -  Ad
00:48:50 - Out today
00:52:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Iron Galaxy’s Chelsea Blasko

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
